text: It is a bit annoying that automatic merging of patch releases for packages suddenly stopped working because of the license check. I have deadlines and wanted to do version bumps as usual, but it suddenly became much more work which was not anticipated.

elements.text: It is a bit annoying that automatic merging of patch releases for packages suddenly stopped working because of the license check. I have deadlines and wanted to do version bumps as usual, but it suddenly became much more work which was not anticipated.

text: Sorry to hear that. It should just be a matter of adding any OSI license (GPL, MIT, etc) and re-triggering registration.

elements.text: Sorry to hear that. It should just be a matter of adding any OSI license (GPL, MIT, etc) and re-triggering registration.

text: Yes, but first I have to discuss the license with the collaborators :smile:
